content: evih yenoh tah knitandbolt com honey hive hat gauge color management tip during decreases as you begin the crown decreases the length of each round shortens to maintain 9 stitches = 2 in stockinette stitch the purl stripe needles knit until 5 stitches before the next purl section use needle size to match gauge us 6 needle used for sample pull out the working yarn until you reach the next color change use 16 circular needles and switch to dpns or use magic loop begin purling with the new color yarn to keep yarn taut you may tie a temporary knot in the loop these loops will be woven in during finishing worsted weight crown decreases pooling yarns work best yarn should have long color transitions for best effect switch to dpns or use magic loop as needed instructions round 1 k10 k2tog repeat to end of round in purl sections switch to p10 p2tog cast on round 2 and all even-numbered rounds work stitches as established knit the knits cast on 88 stitches using a stretchy method german twisted cast-on or a loose purl the purls long tail cast-on round 3 k9 k2tog repeat switching to p9 p2tog where appropriate place marker to indicate beginning of round and join in the round being careful not round 5 k8 k2tog repeat adjust purl section accordingly to twist round 7 k7 k2tog repeat brim round 9 k6 k2tog repeat work in k2 p2 ribbing for 2 round 11 k5 k2tog repeat round 13 k4 k2tog repeat body round 15 k3 k2tog repeat knit all stitches until you begin to notice a color change in the yarn when the color begins to shift round 16 k2 k2tog repeat adjust any remaining purl sections switch to purling during the color change section finishing return to knitting once you re back into the main color cut yarn leaving a long tail thread tail through remaining stitches pull tight to continue knitting in this manner knitting in the main color and purling in the close and secure contrasting color to create a spiral purl stripe effect the purl stripe should twist weave in ends including any color-change loops naturally around the hat spiraling to the top work until the hat measures approxi- block your hat to finish mately 8 9 from the cast-on edge wear your hive
